U

UpdateFileRecorder - Class in com.team08storyapp
UpdateFileRecorder is a class that records, retrieves, clears the ids of files that need to be uploaded.
UpdateFileRecorder() - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.UpdateFileRecorder
 
updateOfflineStory(Story) - Method in class com.team08storyapp.FileHelper
Update process is done by deleting the original file and write a new file.
updateStoryFragment(Story, StoryFragment, int, int) - Static method in class com.team08storyapp.StoryController
This method replaces a fragment in a story at a particular index, or adds it to the story if it does not exist.
UpdateTask - Class in com.team08storyapp
UpdateTask is an AsyncTask Object that performs sync function in the background.
UpdateTask(UpdateToolPackage) - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.UpdateTask
Constructor of UpdateTask requires an updateToolPackage that contains all the information it needs: a FileHelper object to get the ids of stories that need to be uploaded an ESHelepr object to upload stories a Context object to instantiate a NotificationHelper object that puts up a notification in status bar
UpdateToolPackage - Class in com.team08storyapp
UpdateToolPackage is a class that mainly works as a parameter object.
UpdateToolPackage(FileHelper, ESHelper, Context) - Constructor for class com.team08storyapp.UpdateToolPackage
Constructor of UpdateToolPackage requires a FileHelper object, ESHelper Object, Context object.
